H0.text: Bohemia is a region of what country. Germany

H1.text: Bohemia is a region of what country. Austria

H2.text: Bohemia is a region of what country. Poland

H3.text: Bohemia is a region of what country. ÄŒR

A4.text: Bohemia is the westernmost and largest historical region of the Czech Republic.

A5.text: After World War I and the establishment of an independent Czechoslovak state, the whole of Bohemia became a part of Czechoslovakia.
